extractedData.name: Santhanapriyalakshmi
extractedData.title: .NET Team Lead | Solution Architect
extractedData.summary: Experienced .NET Team Lead with 7+ years of expertise in building scalable enterprise applications using .NET Core, C#, Web API, and micro services architecture. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, owning end-to-end delivery, and driving quality software solutions in banking, logistics, and financial services domains. Adept in solution design, clean code practices, DevOps integration, and agile methodologies.

experience.description: Leading a team of developers for a financial web application. Architected and developed scalable RESTful APIs using .NET Core. Mentored junior developers and led code reviews, improving code quality by 30%. Integrated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and Octopus for seamless deployments.

Designed and developed REST APIs for high-performance fintech applications. Contributed to database design and implemented optimized stored procedures. Drove agile practices by participating in sprint planning and demos.
Built and maintained modules in a healthcare web platform using .NET Core. Evaluated and implemented new technologies to improve performance.
Developed RESTful services for mobile and web-based applications. Worked across MySQL, SQL Server, and MongoDB for various projects.
Developed logistics software using VB.NET, Crystal Reports. Performed unit testing and improved test coverage for critical modules.

education.university: Dr. Mahalingam College of Engineering and Technology
Chikkanna Govt Arts and Science College

projects.name: Elan Credit Card Platform
projects.description: Built APIs to integrate with third-party services (Monevo, TransUnion). Enhanced transaction reliability and customer onboarding speed.

projects.name: Nita Mukesh Ambani Cultural Center
projects.description: Developed modules for event scheduling and user management.

projects.name: Melior Discovery Project Tracking and Analytics
projects.description: Implemented project allocation, monitoring dashboards, and user roles.

projects.name: BranchX Loan Platform
projects.description: Created modules for loan management and Razorpay integration.

projects.description: Developed APIs for various banking operations (loans, credit cards).

projects.description: Developed invoice/report generation and WMS/TMS modules.
